ygData.subject: RE: Thread was closed
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm I have found if I annoy, or treat badly a police officer or a clerk at a government office, I tend to be treated badly in return. ... From: Stephen E.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm I have found if I annoy, or treat badly a police officer or a clerk at a
government office, I tend to be treated badly in return.


-----Original Message-----
From: Stephen E. McCloskey [mailto:s.mccloskey@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2000 9:44 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Thread was closed


From: "Stephen E. McCloskey" <s.mccloskey@...>

Bah! I look at it this way:
1. In the long run we pay their salary.
2. We give them something to do.
3. They should be thanking us!
4. I don't think we are annoying them, as it stands now the post is only
ignored.
5. As George Carlin said to the cop, "Hey! You're a public servant right?
Don't I pay your salary? Get me a glass of water!"
6. Someone alread sent this in to eqcasters to see if they can do something
about it.

-Steve

At 09:35 AM 2/23/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
>You folks do know that annoying them to death is not likely to work very
>well, right?=)
>
>Not saying I disagree with you, but perhaps we need to go about this
another
>way than annoying the board admins with bumping
